title: What rock band has had the most comeback tours? - Quora

response.answer_text: Scorpions Despite being on a farewell tour, the Scorpions will not break up. Though the band announced that their massive tour behind their 2010 album Sting in the Tail would be their last, the German rockers have reconsidered their future.  “We called it the farewell tour thinking – believing – it would be the last time we would play the U.S.A., that wherever we played, that would be the last time,” said guitarist Matthias Jabs. “But the tour is still going, due to demand from the audience and promoters.”

Kiss, Black Sabbath & Guns and Roses. Kiss is notorious for this and well as farewell tours. Gene Simmons loves making money. The guy is a very successful businessman and a terrible rockstar sellout who made Kiss a novelty/joke band by merchandising anything and everything for a buck. Thx.
